rows.label: qev086904_MSG0001
rows.name: I'd say that's enough to get the project back on track.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0002
rows.name: Thank you all so much for your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0003
rows.name: You really would do anything for Rock, wouldn't you, Celica?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0004
rows.name:
Rock is like family to me.
Nothing could be more precious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0005
rows.name: But Rock say something before...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0006
rows.name:
About how Rock and Ganglion
do terrible thing to Celica's village.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0007
rows.name: Celica not mad at Rock about that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0008
rows.name: Tatsu! That is SO inappropriate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0009
rows.name: I didn't realize he had spoke of this to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0010
rows.name: I'm sorry, Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0011
rows.name: Oh no, it's perfectly all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0012
rows.name: It just means he trusts you all enough to share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0013
rows.name:
You see, Rock was created by the Ganglion
to be a living weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0015
rows.name:
When they attacked my village,
his kind killed so many people...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0016
rows.name:
But something awoke in Rock that night.
He took me and ran. He saved my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0017
rows.name: That's amazing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0018
rows.name: That's why you were so passionate about Rock not fighting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_JNK0010
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev086904_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that Celica is very considerate of others.

rows.label: qev086904_JNK0020
rows.name: Grumble

rows.label: qev086904_SEL0021
rows.name: Say what a waste it is that Rock won't fight.

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0019
rows.name: I couldn't agree more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0020
rows.name:
And it's thanks to that kindness that Rock's found
a way to live his life in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0021
rows.name: You're all so sweet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0022
rows.name: Wait. You actually want the poor thing to fight again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0023_m
rows.name: How can you even THINK such a thing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0023_f
rows.name: How can you even THINK such a thing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0025
rows.name:
Rock waiting back home, right?
Team should deliver aerozium ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0026
rows.name: Then Rock can get back to work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0027
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0028
rows.name: Elma, look![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086904_MSG0029
rows.name: Get ready![ST:wait ]
